§ Charles Iliya Krempeaux (Fediverse, Who is Who)

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Charles Iliya Krempeaux**, who goes by the nickname **@reiver**, is a notable person on the Fediverse because —

• [[fediverse/spacehost]], which is a fully-managed hosting provider for all the Fediverse, which he created with [[fediverse/personchris-trottier]] and [[fediverse/person/massoud-seifi]],
• [[fediverse/software/greatape]], which is Fediverse software focused on audio- and video- conversation, which he created with [[fediverse/personchris-trottier] and [[fediverse/person/massoud-seifi]],
• [[fediverse/software/postfreely]], which is Fediverse software focused on long-form writing, blogging, and the small-net, which he created with Mathew, initially by forking [[fediverse/software/writefreely]] and then taking it along a different development path.

§§ Sysop

**Charles Iliya Krempeaux** is the <abbr title="system operator">sysop</abbr> for the following Fediverse servers:

• firefish.lol ([[fediverse/software/firefish]])
• firefish.social ([[fediverse/software/firefish]])
• flamewar.social ([[fediverse/software/lemmy]])
• greatape.social ([[fediverse/software/greapape]])
• kbin.forum ([[fediverse/software/kbin]])
• playset.social ([[fediverse/software/pixelfed]])
